activities: Bare Escentuals Beauty, Inc. in the U.S. (“BE”) may receive, have access to, or process personal information regarding its EU employees, contractors, and/or job applicants (collectively, “EU Workers”) in connection with the following BE human resources systems or tools: (i) HR management (PeopleSoft), (ii) employee directory (Global Address Book), (iii) social intranet (BE Hive), (iv) employee performance management (SuccessFactors), (v) recruiting management (Taleo), and (vi) learning development (EBSCO).
personaldata: certain human resources data and personal data regarding EU Workers processed electronically or via the web
